channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Excel Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Excel Viewer

item.title: CVE-2018-1029|2024-08-05T03:44:11.819Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20excel%20viewer
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Excel software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Excel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Excel Viewer, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0920, CVE-2018-1011, CVE-2018-1027.
